text: While making wine, the devil added fox blood first, then wolf and later pig. So when a person drinks a little, he has a mellow voice, like to say flattering words, and he looks at you cunningly, like a fox. When he drinks more, he becomes a wolf, aggressive and fierce. And, when he drinks more than the bill, he turns into a pig and ends up rolling in the mud. Russian Anonymous
title: Tres clases de borrachera
author: nan Anónimo
